## Analysis of Data set titled "Harman74.cor"

This data is a correlation matrix of 24 psychological tests given to 145 seventh and eight-grade children in a Chicago suburb. The research was performed by Holzinger and Swineford.

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

data("Harman74.cor")

data_df <- as.data.frame(Harman74.cor$cov)
library(esquisse)
##esquisser(data = data_df, viewer = "browser")

```

## Correlation Plot of data using Base R

```{r}
library(corrplot)

corr_mat <- Harman74.cor$cov

corrplot(corr_mat, method = "color", tl.cex = 0.5)

```

## Correlation Plot of data using GGplot

```{r}
library(ggcorrplot)

p <- ggcorrplot(corr_mat, hc.order = TRUE)

```
